Tooltip:
This activity uses the Petstore REST webservice to add a pet and verify it was added in the database. 
Provide an ID and a name for the pet to be added.
The activity outputs a Pet object

Arguments.Name: petId
Arguments.Tooltip:
The ID of the pet to be added.
Requires a numeric expression. Also accepts Null

Arguments.Name: petResponse
Arguments.Tooltip: The Pet object resulted after interrogating the database using the provided petID
